> [deliriumgoddesss](#comment_17_17cZ8sioZ4oz5eGwE6Qck5Ds1USPoWEXkZ): it doesnt work.

It works fine. It's just not as nice and usable as say the desktop client, Patchwork.

> [styromaniac](#comment_440_16NS3rBdW9zpLmLSQoD8nLTtNVsRFtVBhd): In which way? I want to test it out. I just have to PM invite codes.

AFAIK, you don't need to use invites with Manyverse. It uses a DHT to get users onto a few onboarding pubs.

> [deliriumgoddesss](#comment_25_17cZ8sioZ4oz5eGwE6Qck5Ds1USPoWEXkZ): if i dont need invites, how to connect to pubs??? i cant connect to any pub

I don't think you need to explicitly get invited to any pubs. It connects to a couple for you. There's a pane on the right that looks like a globe. You should see pubs appear and disappear on there without you having to do anything.

Manyverse is a pretty early app though. So if you can't get it to work maybe come back to it later or check out the other apps for desktop. The underlying protocol, secure scuttlebutt is pretty mature and it's been around for a couple of years now.
